articles.author: Reuters
articles.title: Six teens in court in connection with beheading of French teacher - Reuters
articles.description: Six teenagers go on trial behind closed doors on Monday in connection with the beheading of French history teacher Samuel Paty in 2020, a murder that <a href="/world/europe/french-pm-paying-tribute-slain-teacher-says-france-will-defend-its-values-2021-10-16/"…
articles.content:
PARIS, Nov 27 (Reuters) - Six teenagers go on trial behind closed doors on Monday in connection with the beheading of French history teacher Samuel Paty in 2020, a murder that shocked the country.
